page.title: 19Saturday night at the cinema
page.content: Since the school holiday started I had been bored. After a few days all my friends went on holiday. My dad said that on saturday we would all go to the cinema. The days went slowly and I was very impatient. On Saturday we left home at 7 p.m. and caught a bus which took 40 minutes to get to the West End in London. It was dark when we got to the Odeon in Leicester Square and joined the line to go in. After about 10 minutes we were in the waiting room. I bought some pop-corn and a drink. We had to wait again while the rubbish left by people who had seen the film earlier was cleared.The film we saw was "2010" It was about space and was really good. Then we ate hamburgers and got home very late.At last I went to bed, sorry that Saturday was over but glad that I was going swimming the next morning.
